title: Kid in a Sheet

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scare a player, forcing them to run away. They will target a random player in addition to their original target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Scaring the same player twice will give them a heart attack, which is just you attacking their heart.

desc:
Post 3682
*Next up, the young but terrifying, Kid in a Sheet!*
*Ahhhhhhh!*
